Room.Name: Thieve's Guild Blue Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the blue room, hoping to qualify for advancement.
Room.LongDescription: The guild requires that all thieves must pass a qualification test before they are allowed to advance to the next level. A master training thief is here in the blue room, waiting to test you. If you sucessfully steal the training room key from him, you will not have to fight him. But woe to you if he detects your crude attempts.
